name: apps.event.authorizations.list
desc: Get a list of authorizations for the given event context. Each authorization represents an app installation that the event is visible to.

errors.auth_mismatch: The given authorization token is not associated with the app that sent this event.
errors.internal_error: An unexpected error occurred while finding authorizations for this event.
errors.invalid_event_context: The given `event_context` didn't match an event.
